22 import rospy
23 from roslib.packages import get_pkg_dir
24 import sys
25 import os
26 import subprocess
27 from xml.etree import ElementTree
28 
29 def set_boot_configuration(config):
30 
31  autorun = ElementTree.Element('boot')
32  autorun.set('config', config)
33  tree = ElementTree.ElementTree(autorun)
34 
35  tmp = os.path.join(get_pkg_dir("cobot_gui"),'resources','autorun.xml')
36 
37  tree.write(file_or_filename = tmp, encoding='utf8', method='xml')
38 
39 ##@cond UNITEST
40 if __name__ == "__main__":
41 
42  rospy.init_node('cobot_gui_autorun_%d' % os.getpid())
43 
44  config = rospy.get_param("~config", "${cobot_gui}/resources/config/default.conf")
45 
46  set_boot_configuration(config)
47 
48  subprocess.Popen(['rosrun', 'cobot_gui','autorun.py'])
49 
50 #@endcond
